text: @NYGovCuomo Lies, just because numbers are increasing in some areas doesn’t mean COVID19 is getting worse. Majority of cases are asymptomatic, which is great, no symptoms. Death and hospitalizations are on a downward trend as well, which is good news. We ain’t buying what you’re selling.
